title: #16: Interview with James R. Fitzgerald on arresting the Unabomber
description:
Jim Clemente interviews his fellow retired FBI Profiler, James R. Fitzgerald on his role in the arrest and prosecution of Ted  Kaczynski also known as the infamous serial killer/bomber - The UNABOMBER.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
